name: llm-brainstorm
description: Advanced prompt engineering and conversational AI with LangChain

scripts.test-config: ts-node -e "import { ConfigManager } from './src/managers/config-manager'; const cm = ConfigManager.getInstance(); console.log('✅ Config loaded:', cm.getConfigStats());"
scripts.test-db: ts-node -e "import { FiendsDBManager } from './src/managers/fiends-db-manager'; const db = FiendsDBManager.getInstance(); console.log('✅ Database loaded:', db.getStats());"
scripts.list-characters: ts-node -e "import { FiendsDBManager } from './src/managers/fiends-db-manager'; const db = FiendsDBManager.getInstance(); console.log('Characters:', db.getAllCharacters().map(c => c.name));"
